export const ScrollUtils={preventScroll:target=>{if(!target||!target.style){return null;}const currentScrollY=window.scrollY;target.style.position='fixed';target.style.width='100%';target.style.top="-".concat(currentScrollY,"px");// 현재 스크롤 위치
target.style.overflowY='scroll';return currentScrollY;},allowScroll:(target,prevScrollY)=>{if(!target||!target.style){return;}target.style.position='';target.style.width='';target.style.overflowY='auto';target.style.top="";if(prevScrollY){window.scrollTo(0,prevScrollY);}}};
